item.title: Service Mesh : Istio and Kiali Setup
item.description: It’s the first time for me to learn what service mesh is, how it works, and how to start the lab to deep dive on this stuff. In this article, there will be some of my notes about how to install Istio and see the visualization of some microservices that will have been monitored by Istio and I’m going to write it up now.
